content: Hello guys, I am looking for an help to understand the java libraries to be used to implement FHIR bulk $export and bulk status functionalities. We are currently using HAPI FHIR based rest server (STU version 3.0) to present the Healthcare related resources. I am planning implement the bulk export functionalities in the same reset server but confused on IResourceProvider to be used for this purpose.
Maybe better to try asking in #hapi
